sense.def:
Z izrazom
nowhere
povemo, da ni kraja, kjer bi se nekaj lahko zgodilo.

seg.quote: She had nowhere else to go.
Nowhere have I seen any mention of this.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se je neka oseba ali stvar pojavila
from nowhere
ali
out of nowhere
, pomeni, da se je pojavila nenadoma in nepričakovano.

cit.quote: kar na lepem, kot strela z jasnega

seg.quote: I spent hours waiting for a bus in the middle of nowhere.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
is getting nowhere
ali kadar nekaj
is getting someone nowhere
, ne napreduje ali ni uspešen.

cit.quote: ne priti nikamor; ne voditi nikamor

seg.quote: Calling me names will get you nowhere.

sense.def:
Izraz
nowhere near
lahko uporabimo namesto
not
, če želimo poudariti, da nekaj nikakor ni res.

seg.quote: Lions are nowhere near as fast as cheetahs.
